name: Gem Quest: 4 Elements
description:
Embark on a thrilling journey with the 4 Elements through a magical fairy-tale world and restore the 4 Elements. A somber fate has befallen the inhabitants of the once beautiful and wonderful kingdom: the forces of nature were unleashed and the 4 Elements, Earth, Wind, Fire and Water are now in turmoil! Only you can save this once wonderful world!

Features

• 4 books of magic to unlock and study
• 16 mysterious cards to collect
• Gripping storyline presented in beautiful animation
• 64 captivating levels with 20 challenging bonus tasks
